sentence.text: Additionally, decreased negative regulation of fibroblast growth factor receptor signaling pathway-centrosome cycle contributed to tumor suppressive effect through attenuating cell growth, clonogenic ability and facilitating apoptosis via protein polyubiquitination/caspase-3 pathway in PANC1 and Capan-2 cells.

entity.text: negative regulation of fibroblast growth factor receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Furthermore, the xenograft study confirmed the tumor proliferation-promoting role of negative regulation of fibroblast growth factor receptor signaling pathway-centrosome cycle in PANC1 cells.

entity.text: negative regulation of fibroblast growth factor receptor signaling pathway
